CVXPY
Maximize
  Sum(X, None, False)
Subject To
 38: max(X + Y, None, False) <= 1.0
 43: Y == 1.0
Bounds
 X free
 Y free
End
----------------------------------------
AFTER COMPILATION
Minimize
 Obj: -1 x_0 -1 x_1
Subject to
 c1: +1 x_2 = +1
 c2: +1 x_3 = +1
 c3: +1 x_0 +1 x_2 -1 x_4 <= +0
 c4: +1 x_1 +1 x_3 -1 x_4 <= +0
 c5: +1 x_4 <= +1
Bounds
 x_0 free
 x_1 free
 x_2 free
 x_3 free
 x_4 free
End
----------------------------------------
SCIP
Maximize
 Obj: +1 X_0 +1 X_1
Subject to
 max_1_0: +1 X_0 +1 Y_0 -1 max_1 <= +0
 max_1_1: +1 X_1 +1 Y_1 -1 max_1 <= +0
 38: +1 max_1 <= +1
 43_0: +1 Y_0 = +1
 43_1: +1 Y_1 = +1
Bounds
 X_0 free
 X_1 free
 Y_0 free
 Y_1 free
 max_1 free
End
